data.title: Kelly McGillis
data.text:
Born: 9-Jul-1957

Birthplace: Newport Beach, CA

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Bisexual [1]

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Love interest in Top Gun

[1] Andrew Morton, Tom Cruise An Unauthorized Biography (2008), calls her a lesbian on page 88. McGillis came out in a 2009 interview on the internet show Girl Rock. Quoted on shewire.com as to her present dating preferences, she stated "Definitely a woman. I'm done with the man thing."

Father: (dentist, d.)

Husband: Boyd Black (writer, m. 1979, div. 1981)

Husband: Barry Tubb (actor, div.)

Husband: Fred Tillman (yacht broker, m. 31-Dec-1988, div. 2002, two daughters)

Daughter: Kelsey Lauren (b. 24-May-1990)

Daughter: Sonora Ashley (b. 11-Apr-1993)

Boyfriend: Don Yesso (1988)

Girlfriend: Melanie Leis (sales exec, together since 2000, civil union 2010)

High School: Newport Harbor High School, Newport Beach, CA (1976)

University: Pacific Conservatory of Performing Arts, Santa Maria, CA

University: Juilliard School

Raped New York City (Feb-1982)

Risk Factors: Smoking

TELEVISION

One Life to Live Glenda Livingston (1984)
